thread.title: Bob Katter calls for exoneration of sacked Supreme Court judge
thread.title_full: Bob Katter calls for exoneration of sacked Supreme Court judge

title: Bob Katter calls for exoneration of sacked Supreme Court judge
text: | MP3 download Federal MP Bob Katter is pushing to clear the name of a former Supreme Court judge he helped sack from the bench nearly 30 years ago.Angelo Vasta is the only judge to have been dismissed by a parliament in Australia in a century.Bob Katter was a member of the state cabinet that decided Mr Vasta should be removed, but Mr Katter says the sacking was unfair - and it's been nagging his conscience. His state colleagues yesterday tabled a bill in the Queensland Parliament to revoke the decision. Featured:Bob Katter, Federal Member for Kennedy, leader, Katter's Australian Party, former Queensland Nationals member for FlindersAngelo Vasta, former Supreme Court judgeMike Ahern, Queensland premier 1987-1989
